Articles.Content:
Here are a few of my ship designs:

The Reaper Stealth Drone:

Who would have thought it would fly, but it did, oh boy it did!

Images:

Runway:

After takeoff:

Descension:

I'm really not quite sure what parts it uses, but here are the ones i know about:

Stock

Redstar's awesome plane parts - http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17081-Redstar-co-op-Airplane-parts

The Arrowhead's VTOL's parts - http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/15739-The-Arrowhead-VTOL?highlight=arrowhead

Craft file in-case you want a go:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/dp98ryenp5mb354/Reaper%20Stealth%20Drone.craft

Flight instructions:

Takeoff is a bit quirky, but once you get her in the air she flights like a beauty, Landing...Well...... I haven't even tried that, if someone lands it, upload a screenshot for me

I'll be making more craft, and arming this one, so stay tuned!

EDIT: Found the Arrowhead!(It turns out I was searching for the Avalanche, Which was the wrong name xD)

Edited September 15, 2012 by sproginator
Found the link to the Arrowhead

Never tried this mod before...

I think this means I will be remaking some of my craft. I'll try out this when I'm finished downloading the pack.
It's rather fun, I'll be making more planes. By the way have you tried the Reaper out?

I need the second mod part.

EDIT: My experience with the mod so far isn't really that amazing. At first, it looked like one of those mods where there are multiple pieces for one design and that would be all you could make. Then I saw this, which changed my mind.

But when I got the mod all of the hardpoints were off, nothing compatible, etc.

I need the second mod part.

EDIT: My experience with the mod so far isn't really that amazing. At first, it looked like one of those mods where there are multiple pieces for one design and that would be all you could make. Then I saw this, which changed my mind.

But when I got the mod all of the hardpoints were off, nothing compatible, etc.

Mmmmm, well, I'll upload the files the Avalanche contains tomorrow, with credit to whoever made it, as that VTOL is friggin epic
FOUND THE LINK, Updated the post, Massive credit given there, the plane is a beauty!

A CG is a Center of Gravity
